definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement

sentences.english: No thing could damp his spirits.
sentences.chinese: 任何事都不能败他的兴。

sentences.english: The fortunes of a house depend entirely on its master.
sentences.chinese: 家中百事兴，全靠主人命。

sentences.english: I do hate to spoil your fun, but I've got something urgent to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 我真不愿扫了你的兴，但我有紧急的事必须告诉你。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith is survived by his wife and two sons.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生遗下妻子兴两个儿子。

sentences.english: German Army retreats to the Hindenburg Line.
sentences.chinese: 德国陆军务虚的兴登堡线。

sentences.english: At the end of the paper, some construct…
sentences.chinese: 对如何兴“利”除“弊”，提出一些建设性意见。

sentences.english: The 14th Village has its own factories.
sentences.chinese: 兴十四村啊，有自己的工厂。

sentences.english: I do dislike to spoil your fun, but I've got something urgent to acquaint you.
sentences.chinese: 我真不愿扫了你的兴，但我有紧急的事必须告诉你。

sentences.english: Modern history is concerned with the future as well as with the past.
sentences.chinese: 近代史不仅兴过去有关，也兴未来有关。

sentences.english: Modern history is concerned with the future as well as with the past.
sentences.chinese: 近代史不仅兴过去有关，也兴未来有关。

sentences.english: There is nothing in the world that can mar my happiness.
sentences.chinese: 这世上可没有东西能扫了我的兴。

sentences.english: Come and see for yourself at Huangxing Clothes store!
sentences.chinese: 来华兴服装店为你自己来看一下。

sentences.english: She tells me not to be afraid of trouble, and never do things by halves.
sentences.chinese: 她报告我没有关键怕艰易，做事没有要半途而兴。

sentences.english: The Wuqia earthquake occurred only 25 days after the Hindu Kush earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 乌恰地震发生在兴都库什地震之后仅仅25天。

sentences.english: party pooper, but I have to go home now.
sentences.chinese: 真抱歉要扫大家的兴了，可我现在就得回家了。

definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
